course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website is for NSUT East Campus (formerly Ambedkar Institute of Advanced Communication Technologies & Research), a 'University of Technology' with prominent departments like CSE (Computer Science Engineering) and ECE (Electronics and Communication Engineering), and numerous events/FDPs focused on advanced computing technologies, communication, image processing, and system design, clearly indicating a strong technical and programming-related focus.

metadata.institution_name: Netaji Subhas University of Technology, East Campus
